remarks.format: ## Remarks 基实现呈现 `< card >` 具有给定特性的元素。The base implementation renders a `< card >` element with the given attributes. 继承适配器可以重写此方法，并在调用基实现之前修改特性的字典。Inheriting adapters can override this method and modify the dictionary of attributes, before calling the base implementation.
